Text: SAP Close Schedule for ENAassist you with the July SAP close I have provided a condensed version of the attached official Enron SAP Financial Closing Runbook Stacey Aune and I will be attending a daily close meeting with all business units hosted by the COE If you have any close issues please let us know and we will bring them up in this meeting Also if you would like to dial into the meetings call me and I will give you the number Workday All recurring entry documents must be entered by am CST st Workday All current month AP transactions must be entered by am CST MM and AP are closed nd Workday Labor true up rd Workday All GA entries must be posted th Workday Project System settlement Depreciation Posts to FI th Workday All AR transactions including cash application must be complete by pm CST th Workday All FICS postings must be complete Please note the following changes ENA Hyperion is gone and dead ENA Hyperion PL and Corporate reclass entries must be completed by the th workday Corporate Hyperion close schedule remains unchanged Also Note Please verify that your SAP security has been properly setup before the close process starts on Tuesday
